contents: Article 26 (Restrictive Measures) ① Any person who registered in violation of the disqualifications for registration as a player under Article 14, Paragraph 1, Items 4 and 5, and Article 14, Paragraph 2, Items 1 through 11 of this Regulation shall be subject to imprisonment for more than 1 year. A registration ban of less than one year must be imposed. Revised January 24, 2022. ② The Sports Association or the relevant member sport organization shall submit the matter to the Sports Fair Committee of the relevant organization to determine the disciplinary period, etc. for the person referred to in Paragraph 1 and take action in accordance with the procedures therefor. Revised 2022. 1. 24.
